name: After School ExtraCurricular Offerings
description: Holy Name students are able to participate in a variety of after school activities, including: Engineering for Kids Coding Archery Fencing Chess Junior Chef Lego League Art Dance Music Conservatory Makers Craft Keyboarding Mad Science Soccer Tennis
fullDescription: Holy Name students are able to participate in a variety of after school activities, including: Engineering for Kids Coding Archery Fencing Chess Junior Chef Lego League Art Dance Music Conservatory Makers Craft Keyboarding Mad Science Soccer Tennis
whatTheyOffer: Holy Name students are able to participate in a variety of after school activities, including: Engineering for Kids Coding Archery Fencing Chess Junior Chef Lego League Art Dance Music Conservatory Makers Craft Keyboarding Mad Science Soccer Tennis
howToGetIt: To begin, browse their website and see their social media pages. Visit a Campus Tour or Open House. Visit their admissions page to follow the steps for submitting an application.
cost: This is a fee based service.
